channel.title: postgres on icecat471's Devlog
channel.description: Recent content in postgres on icecat471's Devlog

item.title: [Docker] PostgresSQL 설치
item.description: pull & run $ docker run -p 5432:5432 --name postgres \ -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=password \ -d postgres 컨테이너 접속 및 사용자 생성 # 접속 $ docker exec -it postgres /bin/bash # postgres 접속 $ psql - U postgres # 사용자 생성 $ CREATE USER username PASSWORD 'password' SUPERUSER; CREATE ROLE $ CREATE DATABASE test OWNER username CREATE DATABASE
